document_data.name: Buchembrallor
document_data.mainbody: '''Buchembrallor''' was a [[green dragon]] living in [[Cape Velen]] in [[1373 DR]].
document_data.History: During the [[Rage of Dragons]] of [[1373 DR]], Buchembrallor declared war on all ships of [[Wealdath]] and with the help of [[Linussaxannol]] he destroyed a large portion of the coast. Later, the local sailors put a bounty on his head.
document_data.Personality: Buchembrallor was overconfident, believing all creatures of his size or smaller were surely inferior to him and always started a battle with them. Thank to this system, he had acquired a hoard larger than most dragons his age had.
document_data.Relationship: Buchembrallor forged a friendship with Linussaxannol, whom the green dragon respected.
